item.title: Award Winning Short Rib and Chorizo Chili
item.description: This Award Winning Short Rib and Chorizo Chili is packed with tender beef and bold flavors, making it the perfect comfort food for any occasion. With its rich and hearty ingredients, it's sure to become a favorite in your household.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 20 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 120 minutes

â° Total Time: 140 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 pounds beef short ribs
  • 1 pound Mexican chorizo, casings removed
  • 2 cans fire-roasted tomatoes
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 cups beef broth
  • 1 can kidney beans, drained and rinsed

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, brown the short ribs over medium-high heat, then remove and set aside.
  2. In the same pot, add chorizo and cook until browned, then add onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
  3. Stir in chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, cooking for another minute.
  4. Add the fire-roasted tomatoes, beef broth, and short ribs back to the pot.
  5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours until the ribs are tender.
  6. Remove the short ribs, shred the meat, and return it to the pot along with the kidney beans.
  7. Simmer for an additional 15 minutes before serving.

  3. Warm the corn tortillas in a separate pan until pliable.
